heading: Diablo 4 2.2.0 Patch Notes
content: Discover the 2.2.0 Patch Notes including all the updates from the PTR here on Maxroll for Diablo 4 Season 8: Belial's Return! The Developer Update Livestream was held just now on April 24th to learn everything you need to know for 2.2.0 Patch and Season 8, which are getting closer and closer! Are you ready? :) If you're eager for more, you can also catch up on the Developer Update Livestream from yesterday! Trap Expertise tempering recipe moved from the Offensive to the Utility category. The Elemental Control Recipe has had levels of Convulsion replaced by levels of Static Discharge. After PTR feedback, the final form of Belial, Lord of Lies was made meaner and more challenging. Aspect of Recalling Feathers Aspect of Falling Feathers Aspect of Wild Claws Aspect of Plains Power All Lair Bosses have been updated to make their fights more challenging and engaging. This includes increased health and damage across the board, and changes to the fight itself. Are you ready for Season 8? We hope you enjoyed the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus is now on the 2.2.0 patch and Season 8, grabbing as much knowledge we can for Season 8 to provide you the best and Resources as always. If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
